title: Unable to login to client
body: I can login in to league website but not on client, tried changing my password but problem still persists. SEND HELP

replies.body:
Since this is an account-specific issue, I recommend you submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our account specialists can investigate into this and get back to you.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

I have just posted something about this I have not been on for a couple months and thought my password might be wrong but I can login fine on here but for some reason it is saying my username & password combination are not recognised when trying to get into game.

> [{quoted}](name=P3NGY,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=MjoymcH1,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-23T12:47:35.987+0000)
>
> I have just posted something about this I have not been on for a couple months and thought my password might be wrong but I can login fine on here but for some reason it is saying my username & password combination are not recognised when trying to get into game.

Yea I was playing just fine yesterday and this morning when I tried, bump
I've been searching about and not sure how to fix this issue i have yet to receive any emails back from the support team about it and i can't see many threads about this either.

> [{quoted}](name=P3NGY,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=MjoymcH1,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-23T12:52:55.024+0000)
>
> I've been searching about and not sure how to fix this issue i have yet to receive any emails back from the support team about it and i can't see many threads about this either.

Ye been 4 hours now and problem still persists, I hope Riot can provide me some assistance soon :(
